subject: Skateboards
lead_paragraph: Joe Maloof, one of the brothers who own the Sacramento Kings, remembers steering his skateboard down an incline as a teenager, hitting a drain and flying through the air in a spectacular wipeout.
snippet: Joe Maloof, one of the brothers who own the Sacramento Kings, remembers steering his skateboard down an incline as a teenager, hitting a drain and flying through the air in a spectacular wipeout.
